reviews.name: Wicked Business
reviews.reviewText: As the second book in the series I thought it was great. It was just what I was expecting. I love the characters. It was a quick read and very well written, great for the beach. I think this series can continue for a long time just like the Stephanie Plum series. I for one am looking forward to the next one.
reviews.title: If you love Janet you will love this book

reviews.name: Wicked Business
reviews.reviewText: The book was in great condition and at a very good price online.
reviews.title: Excellent book

reviews.name: Wicked Business
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed reading this book. I love Janet and her Stephanie Plum series. I love Lizzy's character and the way she thinks as well as her cooking really delicious cupcakes and food. I feel there are similarities between her Plum series and her Lizzy & Diesel series. With this book, the two main male characters remind me of in the Plum series, Ranger and Morelli. I really love how Janet writes and the way she portrays characters. I enjoy her writing style and although this book was full of content I wasn't familiar with, I still really enjoyed this book. Definitely a good read :)
reviews.title: 16 July 2012

reviews.name: Wicked Business
reviews.reviewText: THis book meets all expectations of Janet Evonovich's writing it is fast paced and funny and I could not wait to turn the page to find out what happens next if you like Janet Evonovich this is a sure winner
reviews.title: Great Read!!
